knimeNode.name: Pseudoanonymization
knimeNode.shortDescription: Node for hashing (SHA-1) the values in the columns with multiple salting strategies.

fullDescription.intro: Node for hashing (SHA-1) the values in the columns with multiple salting strategies.

tab.name: Options
tab.option:
The node applies SHA-1 algorithm for hashing values in selected columns. All values are converted to string then additional information might be concatenated to this string for salting. There are four salting strategies:
None - values in selected are hashed as they are, no additional concatenation is used;
Random - random seed is used for salting every time node is executed. It is possbile to use fixed seed value.
Column - values for additional column is used for salting. Values from selected columns are concatenated row-wise.
Timestamp - selected date and time are used for salting. Values from selected columns are concatenated row-wise.
If activated no hashing will be applied, instead only values with or without salting will be returned.
